text: Prime Cut is a 1972 American crime thriller movie directed by Michael Ritchie and starring Lee Marvin, Gene Hackman, Sissy Spacek, Angel Tompkins, Howard Platt, Eddie Egan, Les Lannom. It was distributed by National General Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1972 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Ritchie
title: Prime Cut
